text: Matija Barl (February 17, 1940 - August 3, 2018) was a Slovene actor, producer and translator. He was born in Ljubljana. In 1962 he founded and organized the first, oldest and most important Slovenian music festival called Slovenska popevka. MOJA GENERACIJA z Mojco Mavec - gost Matija Barl - prvi Kekec (slovene) He was known for his role as Kekec in the 1951 movie Kekec. Barl died in Marezige on August 3, 2018, aged 78.Umrl Matija Barl, ki je v mladosti igral vlogo Kekca ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Slovenian actors Category:Movie actors Category:Movie producers Category:People from Ljubljana
title: Matija Barl
